title: Syntax-and-Code-in-rMarkdown
description:
rMarkdown Series #1 - r-markdown is an extremely useful tool to generate 
academic articles. While you could write plain text, you are also able to 
insert code chunks and generate some results to enrich the file. This 
article will introduce the mostly used, basic but useful syntax and coding 
in rMarkdown.

title: Construction-of-ShinyApp
description:
ShinyApp Series #1 - Data transformation and summarization are the foundation
of any data analyses. In our R community, fortunately, we have a whole set of
tools in tidyverse to facilitate this process. This article will be the 
first of a series of tidyverse tutorials that we are using for our 
internal training. It covers the 8 fundamental verbs related to data 
transformation and summarization in dplyr and tidyr.

title: 8 verbs in tidyverse
description:
Tidyverse Series #1 - Data transformation and summarization are the foundation
of any data analyses. In our R community, fortunately, we have a whole set of
tools in tidyverse to facilitate this process. This article will be the 
first of a series of tidyverse tutorials that we are using for our 
internal training. It covers the 8 fundamental verbs related to data 
transformation and summarization in dplyr and tidyr.
